thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Sue Kelleher
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Sue Kelleher

author: Sue Kelleher
title: Sue Kelleher
text: Perfect!!! I had a slow leak that turned into a complete flat tire this morning..Town Fair Tire was great, from the second i walked in the door, to the time i was leaving...I had a nail in the tire which they advised, they removed and patched...Thank you TFT for making my day !!!!
